actions.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 299 (Roll no. 241).

description: Amendment sought to reduce Air Force Aircraft Procurement by $314.1 million.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 17 in the Congressional Record of June 10, 1996, to reduce the appropriation for Air Force aircraft procurement by $314,100,000. The intent of the amendment is to eliminate funding for procurement of six C-130 J aircraft.
